name: Ocean Abduction
description:
Aliens love fish, everyone knows this.  Try to catch as many pounds of fish as possible by bringing them aboard your (space)ship using your Fishing Tools (Tractor Beam).  Game ends when you run out of battery for your Tractor Beam.

Controls: 

Left + Right Arrows to move

Z + X to open/close Tractor Beam

R to Reset game

Designed and Developed by Thulko

Credits / Assets used

Font: m6x11 by managore 

Music: calm-ambient-2-synthwave-15kby cynicmusic
